item.name: Memory Percent Committed Bytes In Use

discovery_rule.name: Disk Performance Discovery
discovery_rule.key: zbxwmi[{HOST.HOST},"Name","*",Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfDisk_LogicalDisk,-f,"NOT Name LIKE '_Total' AND NOT Name LIKE 'HarddiskVo%'"]

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 10% on volume {#WMIINDEX0}

discovery_rule.name: Network Adapters Discovery
discovery_rule.key: zbxwmi[{HOST.HOST},"Name","*",Win32_PerfFormattedData_Tcpip_NetworkInterface,-f,"NOT Name LIKE 'isatap%' AND NOT Name LIKE 'Teredo%' AND NOT Name LIKE '%ISATAP%'"]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template WMI OS Windows:Started[{#WMIINDEX0}].last()}<>1 and {Template WMI OS Windows:StartMode[{#WMIINDEX0}].str("Auto")}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Service "{#WMIINDEX0}" ({#WMIINDEX1}) is not started

trigger.name: Lack of free memory on server {HOST.NAME}
